title: Set Grok (xAI) API key to the provided value
constraints: Frontend must not edit files in frontend/immutablePaths (compose existing UI components instead).
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; only add backend/migration.mo if an upgrade requires state migration.
nonGoals: Do not add or change any non-Grok providers or reintroduce Demo mode.
Do not implement new backend storage for API keys or secrets.
